issues.description: The problem statement and template refer to an interface named `Rideable`, but the solution implementation defines and uses an interface named `Mountable`. This mismatched naming for the same conceptual entity (the rideable interface) can confuse students when mapping the requirement to implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solutionâ€™s `Mountable` interface to `Rideable` (and update all references in `Pig.java`, `Seal.java`, and other classes) so that it matches the interface name used in the problem statement and template.
